amendment.description: To provide financial aid to local law enforcement officials along the Nation's borders, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3210 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 6. Record Vote Number: 84.

action.text: Amendment SA 3210 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 3192. (consideration: CR S2589-2590; text: CR S2589) To provide financial aid to local law enforcement officials along the Nation's borders, and for other purposes.
